scripts.build: rm -rf public/lib && mkdir -p public/lib && cp node_modules/fairy-stockfish-nnue.wasm/* public/lib && cp node_modules/ffish-es6/ffish.wasm public/ && browserify -p esmify src/main.js -o public/bundle.js && cp node_modules/mithril/mithril.min.js public/lib && cp src/BinaryEngineFeature.js public/lib && cp -f src/server.js .
scripts.buildwithcmd: rd /s /q public\lib & md public\lib && copy /Y node_modules\fairy-stockfish-nnue.wasm\* public\lib && copy /Y node_modules\ffish-es6\ffish.wasm public\ && browserify -p esmify src/main.js -o public/bundle.js && copy /Y node_modules\mithril\mithril.min.js public\lib && copy /Y src\BinaryEngineFeature.js public\lib\ && copy /Y src\server.js .\
